name: Properties
author: Serge Liatko

sections.description:
This plugin adds new custom content type to your WordPress website – Properties. It allows you to publish and organize real estate properties pages. The plugin stays as simple as possible taking benefits of extremely easy WordPress user interface.

Some default taxonomies as Type, Area, Complex and Collection are included by default to be used with properties allowing you to organize your properties listings.

Future Development and Support

For the plugin support and/or feature requests please visit http://sergeliatko.com.

Features to come in Properties plugin future releases:

  • Bedrooms / Bathrooms / Sleeps metafields
  • Property price
  • Property address / map
  • Property tabs (description sections in separate tabs)
  • Availability calendar
sections.installation:
1. Download and activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress dashboard.
  2. Visit Properties -> Settings page and configure the property permalinks.
sections.faq:
How to reach the plugin developer?

  • Please, visit http://sergeliatko.com.

Will this plugin stay free?

  • Yes, this plugin and its usage will stay free. However plugin author reserves the right to develop and offer some extra premium features against a payment in the future.

  • updated translation files

0.1.1

  • removed unnecessary files from the core
  • updated readme.txt

0.1

Initial release of the plugin.
